languages.text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.
languages.original_text: Союзники, на которых действуют {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, равный {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}, и, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше до начала следующего хода офицера.

traits.locale_text: Allies under the effect of the Leader's abilities gain a bonus to their Weapon Skill equal to <u>2×(Leader's FEL bonus)</u> and will deal +<u>(Leader's FEL bonus)</u> more damage on attacks of opportunity until the start of the Leader's next turn.

Allies under the effect of the Leader's abilities gain a bonus to their Weapon Skill equal to <u>(2 × Leader's FEL bonus)</u> and will deal +<u>Leader's FEL bonus</u> more damage on attacks of opportunity until the start of the Leader's next turn.

Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

Allies under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Leader's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

languages.text: Союзники, на которых действуют {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, равный {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}, и, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше до начала следующего хода офицера.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Союзники, на которых действуют способности лидера, получают бонус к Ближнему Бою, равный <u>(2 × бонус ОБЩ лидера)</u>, и, совершая атаки по возможности, наносят на <u>бонус ОБЩ лидера</u> урона больше до начала следующего хода лидера.

Союзники, на которых действуют способности лидера, получают бонус к Ближнему Бою, равный <u>(2 × бонус ОБЩ лидера)</u>, и, совершая атаки по возможности, наносят на <u>бонус ОБЩ лидера</u> урона больше до начала следующего хода лидера.

Союзники, на которых действуют способности лидера, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, равный {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}, и, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}, наносят на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} лидера.

languages.text: 当盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响时，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}还会额外提高{uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}点。此外，盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点伤害。此效果持续至直到军官下个回合开始。
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 当盟友受到领袖能力影响时，还会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，等同于<u>（2×领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值）</u>。此外，盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}可以造成额外伤害，额外伤害等同于<u>领袖的社交加值</u>。此效果持续至直到领袖下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

当盟友受到领袖能力影响时，还会获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，等同于{uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}。此外，盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}可以造成额外伤害，额外伤害等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}。此效果持续至直到领袖下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

当盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响时，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}还会额外提高{uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}点。此外，盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此效果持续至直到军官下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Los aliados que se hallen bajo los efectos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} igual a {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} e infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de daño adicional con sus {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del oficial.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Los aliados que se hallen bajo los efectos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del oficial reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} igual a {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} e infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional con sus {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial.

Los aliados que se hallen bajo los efectos de las capacidades del líder reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} igual a {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} e infligen +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} de daño adicional con sus {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del líder.

languages.text: Verbündete, die unter dem Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} stehen, erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} und fügen bei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Offiziers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr Schaden zu.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Verbündete, die unter dem Effekt der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offiziers stehen, erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} und fügen bei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

Verbündete, die unter dem Effekt der Fähigkeiten des Anführers stehen, erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} und fügen bei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} bis zum Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Anführers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr Schaden zu.

languages.text: Les alliés sous l'effet des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} égal à {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} et infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires lors des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain tour de l'officier.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés sous l'effet des capacités du Leader reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} égal à <u>(2 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader)</u> et infligent +<u>bonus de FRA du Leader</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires lors des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Leader.

Les alliés sous l'effet des capacités du Leader reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} égal à {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} et infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires lors des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Leader.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果を受けている味方は、オフィサーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}に{uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}の与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}される。
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: リーダーのアビリティの効果を受けている味方は、リーダーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}に<u>(2 × リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ボーナス)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}の与ダメージが+<u>リーダーのFELボーナス</u>される。

リーダーのアビリティの効果を受けている味方は、リーダーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}に{uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}の与ダメージが+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay'ın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinin{/g} etkisi altında olan dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliklerine {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanırlar ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarında{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} daha fazla hasar verirler. Bu etkiler, Subay'ın bir sonraki turunun başına dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next turn.
